Text: RE FW Form of Revolving Credit Agreement and Guaranty Cc Attached are the certificates and resolutions for your review Best regards Gina Karathanos Sr Legal Specialist Enron Global Finance Legal phone fax Original Message From Bahlmann Gareth Sent Friday October AM To Fossum Drew Brown William E Karathanos Gina Cc Hayslett Rod Saunders James St Clair Carol Subject Re FW Form of Revolving Credit Agreement and Guaranty Gina Karathanos has prepared the certs and resolutions They are know being reviewed by VE Drew the docs must be scrubbed vs the bylaws etc to confirm the form VE is drafting the opinions now Gareth Bahlmann

Osprey II Participation Agreement Cc Attached below is the latest draft of Amendment No to the Participation Agreement in connection with Osprey II I will have our clerk deliver copies of Amendment No to the Participation Agreement dated July the Participation Agreement dated Sept and the Osprey Indenture dated Sept this evening Please let me know if you need anything else Best regards Gina Karathanos Forwarded by Gina KarathanosCorpEnron on PM on AM To cc Subject Osprey II Participation Agreement Attached please find a draft of Amendment No to the Participation Agreement for the Osprey II transaction Please be advised that this draft is simultaneously being distributed to our clients and therefore remains subject to their review and comments Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or comments Best regards Evelyn Lim Amendment No to Osprey PAdoc This email message may contain legally privileged andor confidential information If you are not the intended recipients or the employee or agent responsible for delivery of this message to the intended recipients you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this email message is strictly prohibited If you have received this message in error please immediately notify the sender and delete this email message from your computer Amendment No to Osprey PAdoc
